creator: ramon.casha@megabyte.net
text:
I am using symbolic links to directories in order to make a variety of dirs 
available under one virtual host. This worked in Tomcat 4.0, but with 4.1 
anything under a symlinked directory returns a 404 error.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Tomcat now prevents reading anything located outside the webapp root directory,
which increases security. The check which causes this may eventually become
optional, but will be enabled by default, esp if people contribute the patch to
do it.
